title: Did Mitch McConnell Say He’d Support Trump as GOP Nominee in 2024?
subtitle: During an appearance on Fox News, U.S. Sen. Mitch McConnell seemed to indicate he would support the former president if he ran again.
author: Bethania Palma
vclaim: U.S. Senate Minority Leader Mitch McConnell said "absolutely" when asked if he would support former President Donald Trump if he was the Republican Party's nominee in 2024.
